title: Huge FPS drops since 6.23 on mac, game unplayable
body:
Since I updated to the most recent patch, LoL has had huge fps issues. Usually, I manage to get 60fps most of the time when I set it to 720p and very low settings, as well as closing my other applications (my computer isn't very good). However, since this patch, at the beginning of every game now my fps never gets to even 40. Later on, the game becomes unplayable, with less than 1 fps. I can no longer play without risking ruining the game for my team because my fps is so inconsistent. I tried using both the beta client and the legacy client, but the problem persisted with both. 

Here are my specs: 
MacBook Pro (13-inch, Mid 2010)
cpu: 2.66 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo
ram: 8 GB 1067 MHz DDR3
gpu: NVIDIA GeForce 320M 256 MB

Hope I can find a way to resolve this, thanks in advance.

replies.body:
There are a number of things that could cause FPS issues on a Mac, but the most frequent factors are typically missing system updates or power settings. I recommend working through our [FPS Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#section-mac) to ensure this isn't caused by a common culprit and can easily be resolved.

Let me know if those steps caused any noticeable change.
